definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: I want to know the price for the whole kit and caboodle.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道所有這些東西的價錢。

sentences.english: I ordered the best wine on the menu, regardless of price or taste.
sentences.chinese: 我叫了菜單上最好的甜酒，不管價錢多少，味道好壞。

sentences.english: Smoke escape emergency respirator masks are available in a wide variety of prices and weights.
sentences.chinese: 可以買到很多種價錢和重量的緊急防毒面具。

sentences.english: I can't give you more than$35, can you sell it for that?
sentences.chinese: 我頂多能出35美元，這個價錢你肯賣嗎？

sentences.english: Exposed thousands of children Eyebright Eye Gel, the effect is good and price is not expensive.
sentences.chinese: 露千兒小米草眼膠，效果好而且價錢不貴。

sentences.english: I got the rare edition of the book for a song in the flea market.
sentences.chinese: 我在跳蚤市場上以極低的價錢買到了這本書的孤本。

sentences.english: That's very steep for a necklace.
sentences.chinese: 一根項鍊賣這個價錢太貴了。

sentences.english: We eventually pick two meals, marvelling at the cheapness.
sentences.chinese: 最後我們點了兩個菜，對價錢的便宜甚感驚訝。

sentences.english: I've stoped dealing at Brown's,their prices are too high.
sentences.chinese: 我已不到布朗商店買東西了，他們的價錢太貴。

sentences.english: Normally we do not give any discounts, because the prices have already been greatly reduced.
sentences.chinese: 通常我們是不打折扣的，因爲價錢已經減得很低。

sentences.english: The prices in a caf are not any cheaper than a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡店的東西價錢一點都不比餐館便宜。

sentences.english: Sorry, I can't go the price.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我出不起這個價錢。

sentences.english: Perrault smiled and agreed that it was a good price.
sentences.chinese: 佩羅特笑着贊同道，那確實是個好價錢。

sentences.english: He has chosen a DVD to rent and is now at the counter.
sentences.chinese: 有這些折價券，你可以一片的價錢租兩部片子。

sentences.english: It is a good method to ring around to find the best price.
sentences.chinese: 多給幾家商店打電話，選擇最合適的價錢是個好辦法。

sentences.english: We ca subull craptantial't persuadvertisemente the end-users to buy your products during this price.
sentences.chinese: 按這個價錢，我們不能壓服用戶置備你們的產品。

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
to set a price/to fix a price
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
